title: Is He Really A Loser
itunes:title: Is He Really A Loser
description:
Dear Steve and Shirley, I’m 38 years old and I’ve been on a few dates with a 40 year old man that lives with his sister. For our first date, we met up at a miniature golf place and his sister dropped him off. He lied and said it was an Uber, but when I offered to take him home after the date, he admitted that his sister dropped him off because he knew I would see that car at his house. For our 2nd and 3rd dates, I picked him up.............................................

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
Dear Steve and Shirley, I’m 38 years old and I’ve been on a few dates with a 40 year old man that lives with his sister. For our first date, we met up at a miniature golf place and his sister dropped him off. He lied and said it was an Uber, but when I offered to take him home after the date, he admitted that his sister dropped him off because he knew I would see that car at his house. For our 2nd and 3rd dates, I picked him up.............................................
